```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Download data

```{r}
hd2024 <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/joycegill/Advanced-Statistical-Modeling/main/data/2024/hd2024.csv")
ef2024d <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/joycegill/Advanced-Statistical-Modeling/main/data/2024/ef2024d.csv")
dim(hd2024)
dim(ef2024d)
```

```{r}
# report 2-yr schools
two_yr_schools <- hd2024 %>%
  filter(SECTOR %in% c(4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 99)) %>%
  select(UNITID)

# report < 500 population schools
less_than_500_pop_schools <- ef2024d %>%
  filter(UGENTERN <= 500 | is.na(UGENTERN)) %>%
  select(UNITID)

dim(two_yr_schools)
head(two_yr_schools)
dim(less_than_500_pop_schools)
head(less_than_500_pop_schools)
```
